text: O&W; may refer to: *New York, Ontario and Western Railway, a U.S. railroad from 1880 to 1957 *Oneida and Western Railroad, a U.S. railroad from 1913 to 1954, and later the namesake for a unit train operated by the Shamrock Coal Company in the 1980s *Ollech & Wajs, a Swiss watchmaker
title: O&W
